channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Visual Studio
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Visual Studio

item.title: CVE-2019-1079|2024-08-04T18:06:31.670Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20visual%20studio
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists when Visual Studio improperly parses XML input in certain settings files, aka 'Visual Studio Information Disclosure Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2019-0546|2024-08-04T17:51:26.821Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20visual%20studio
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Visual Studio when the C++ compiler improperly handles specific combinations of C++ constructs, aka "Visual Studio Remote Code Execution Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Visual Studio.

item.title: CVE-2019-0727|2024-08-04T17:58:57.966Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20visual%20studio
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when the Diagnostics Hub Standard Collector or the Visual Studio Standard Collector allows file deletion in arbitrary locations.To exploit the vulnerability, an attacker would first have to log on to the system, aka 'Diagnostic Hub Standard Collector, Visual Studio Standard Collector Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2019-0537|2024-08-04T17:51:26.628Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20visual%20studio
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists when Visual Studio improperly discloses arbitrary file contents if the victim opens a malicious .vscontent file, aka "Microsoft Visual Studio Information Disclosure Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Visual Studio.

item.title: CVE-2019-1232|2024-08-04T18:13:29.614Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20visual%20studio
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when the Diagnostics Hub Standard Collector Service improperly impersonates certain file operations, aka 'Diagnostics Hub Standard Collector Service Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2019-0757|2024-08-04T17:58:59.044Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20visual%20studio
item.description: A tampering vulnerability exists in the NuGet Package Manager for Linux and Mac that could allow an authenticated attacker to modify a NuGet package's folder structure, aka 'NuGet Package Manager Tampering Vulnerability'.
